text: @joncoopertweets He's only thinking what Rupert Murdoch is thinking, how to hedge their bets if Trumpocracy crashes and burns in Nov... AND how to selectively mount a defence if/when FOX is sued for liability for COVID19 deaths... As Trump keeps sinking in polls, FOX news will keep hedging bets.
